bibl.title: The Waters of Alexandria.
bibl.note: The success of the city depended on the organisation and construction of a water supply system on a monumental scale from the Nile to meet the domestic, commercial, industrial and recreational needs of a city the size of Alexandria. It became the centre of research and experimentation in water-lifting devices.

bibl.title: Egyptian Stories. A British Egyptological Tribute to Alan B. Lloyd on the Occasion of his Retirement.

bibl.seg: OWENS E.J., The Waters of Alexandria.

Thomas SCHNEIDER and Kasia SZPAKOWSKA (Edd.), Egyptian Stories. A British Egyptological Tribute to Alan B. Lloyd on the Occasion of his Retirement = Alter Orient und Altes Testament. 347 (MÃ¼nster, 2007) pp. 289-299.

The success of the city depended on the organisation and construction of a water supply system on a monumental scale from the Nile to meet the domestic, commercial, industrial and recreational needs of a city the size of Alexandria. It became the centre of research and experimentation in water-lifting devices.
